channel.title: Runescape Age?
channel.description: How long have you been playing Runescape for? I played for 6 years, on and off. Might start again

item.title: Runescape Age?

item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

6 years (7 months banned, on and off)

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Age?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“Tbh I Own, post:38, topic:382687”]I hardly play as I now have a job, and a Daughter to attend to every day/night.
I do get a few nights when my Daughter is asleep, but I just keep forgetting to check RuneScape.

~ Chris.[/quote]

sry, i couldn’t stop laughing at the irony

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Age?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

I started just after Christmas Crackers were dropped all over RSC which was back in December 2001…

I got to like the game, but I gave up playing just over a month later because it was boring, and I didn’t quite know how to play the game.
When I turned 13 I came back to the game (Forgot my username & password for my original account) so I made another.

After reaching 126 combat (Back in 2007) I made what was known as a “Level 3 Pure”

I asked one of my best RuneScape friends to transfer all items from my 126 to my level 3, and I started again.
After sometime I wanted to do some Combat training on my level 3, I thought about it quite a bit.
I gave in a few weeks down the line, and now 4years on, I am 122 combat.

I hardly play as I now have a job, and a Daughter to attend to every day/night.
I do get a few nights when my Daughter is asleep, but I just keep forgetting to check RuneScape.

I’m sure i’ll start playing full time again sometime soon.

Well, there’s my short story of when I first started playing.

~ Chris.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Age?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:31, topic:382687”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=478478.msg3516523#msg3516523 date=1299033687]

10 years now. Started late 2001.

Your ancient.

I may be ancient but I had 3 accounts in 2001.

Lil B Boy100
Lil B Boy200

Both got lost to a hack scam, I was 6 years old at the time.

You were able to change your password via the wrench screen (I think that’s what it was) where you controlled chat and private chat options.

PM: Hey you can get 500,000 coins just by changing your password to runescape Me: Really? Cool. *Change* *Log out* *hacked*

Good thing it, they were only level 30.

P.S. I don’t give out my 3rd accounts name because it is the same as the other two, except with different numbers. I still have it and would like to keep it so long as RuneScape is still online. So it’s only privacy so I don’t get brute-force hacked or something similar.

Lil B Boy300?
[/quote]
Fortunately, no. :D[/quote]
dam… it was worth a shot lol.

Read full topic

You were able to change your password via the wrench screen (I think that’s what it was) where you controlled chat and private chat options.

PM: Hey you can get 500,000 coins just by changing your password to runescape Me: Really? Cool. *Change* *Log out* *hacked*

item.title: Runescape Age?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:21, topic:382687”]About 5 or 6 years ago.

Hah… I remember the 508 update with HD, everybody was crazy and I hated the HD graphics. I was mining pure essence and I thought it was the dumbest idea to have the pure essence rock that gives white ore to be blackish. I also thought it was idiotic to have un-ruined nice paths in the wilderness.[/quote]

I remember it as well.
I was one of the first players to see the new update

Read full topic

About 5 or 6 years ago.

Hah… I remember the 508 update with HD, everybody was crazy and I hated the HD graphics. I was mining pure essence and I thought it was the dumbest idea to have the pure essence rock that gives white ore to be blackish. I also thought it was idiotic to have un-ruined nice paths in the wilderness.
